definition: to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: The Model 4400's low profile makes it the perfect choice for moving into low shipping containers and trailers.
sentences.chinese: 该4400型重式叉车是低集装箱和拖车的最佳选择。

sentences.english: There's the U-Haul I rented to move your things.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个我租过来搬你东西的U型拖车。

sentences.english: Tubes are generally mounted on truck-trailer chassis, referred to as tube trailers.
sentences.chinese: 管道一般是安装在拖车底座上，称作管道拖车。

sentences.english: Tubes are generally mounted on truck-trailer chassis, referred to as tube trailers.
sentences.chinese: 管道一般是安装在拖车底座上，称作管道拖车。

sentences.english: Maybe you'll get tired of boatyard fees and decide to manage by yourself with a trailer.
sentences.chinese: 也许你受不了船坞的收费了，决定用拖车解决问题。

sentences.english: Take, for example, Tony the Tow Truck.
Among its products are cement mixers and tow trucks.
sentences.chinese: 在它的产品中间有水泥搅拌车和拖车。

sentences.english: It also can haul a trailer for short-distance transport.
sentences.chinese: 它还能够长途短途运输的拖车。

sentences.english: Violators Will Be Citied or Towed Away at Vehicle Owner's Expense.
sentences.chinese: 占用者将被罚或被拖车并需自负拖车费。

sentences.english: Violators Will Be Citied or Towed Away at Vehicle Owner's Expense.
sentences.chinese: 占用者将被罚或被拖车并需自负拖车费。

sentences.english: The tow- truck ended up with its front end in the home's in-ground pool.
sentences.chinese: 这辆拖车因为车头在这个家的游泳池里停住而熄火了。

sentences.english: When the call for help comes in, the heavy-duty tow truck is ready to haul any car or truck back for repairs.
sentences.chinese: 当求救有，重型拖车准备长途任何汽车或卡车回修理。

sentences.english: "These" porters games travel trailers and fifth wheel combination.
sentences.chinese: 这些玩具搬运工旅行拖车和第五轮相结合。

sentences.english: At least 15 big rigs collided Friday night on a rain-slicked road.
sentences.chinese: 至少有15辆拖车在湿滑的路面连续相撞。

sentences.english: Okay. So much then for Jameson and for Tony.
sentences.chinese: 好，我们对詹姆逊和《托尼的拖车》的介绍就到这。

sentences.english: So they jacked up the Little House and put her on wheels.
sentences.chinese: 于是他们用起重机顶起小房子，把她放到拖车上。

definition: to drop anchor/to break down (of a car etc)
to go (of car, train etc)/to drive off
small model car/mini-car/small horse-cart/barrow/wheelbarrow/type of folk dance
open-topped container (mounted on a truck or cart) for carrying loads/dump box (of a dump truck)/bucket (of a front loader)/wheelbarrow
